pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the credit package that fits your needs. No subscriptions, no hidden fees.
pricing.noPackages: No pricing packages available at the moment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Credits are our universal currency for using AI tools. Each tool costs a certain number of credits based on its complexity and processing power required.
faq.a2: No, your credits never expire. Use them whenever you want, at your own pace.
faq.a3: If a task fails due to our system, credits are automatically refunded. For other refund requests, please contact our support team.

error.title: Something went wrong

home.subtitle: Transform your ideas into reality with our powerful AI tools. Generate images, videos, music, and more.
home.freeCredits: Sign up now and get 100 free credits to try our tools.

assets.title: My Assets
assets.noAssetsDesc: Your generated images and files will appear here.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing or using FunMagic AI services, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.content: FunMagic AI provides AI-powered tools for image generation, 3D model creation, background removal, and other creative tasks. Services are provided on a credit-based system.

accounts.title: 3. User Accounts
accounts.content: You must create an account to use our services. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for all activities under your account. You must provide accurate information and keep it up to date.

credits.title: 4. Credits and Payments
credits.content: Credits are required to use AI tools. Credits are non-transferable and non-refundable except where required by law or when tasks fail due to system errors. Prices are subject to change with notice.

content.title: 5. User Content
content.content: You retain ownership of content you create using our tools. By using our services, you grant us a license to process your content for service delivery. You are responsible for ensuring your content does not violate any laws or third-party rights.

prohibited.title: 6. Prohibited Uses
prohibited.content: You may not use our services to create illegal content, infringe on intellectual property, generate harmful or misleading content, attempt to reverse-engineer our systems, or violate any applicable laws.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: FunMagic AI provides services 'as is' without warranties. We are not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. Our total liability is limited to the amount you paid in the past 12 months.

changes.title: 8. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of our services after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms. We will notify users of significant changes.

contact.title: 9. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us at legal@funmagic.ai.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: FunMagic AI respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.

collection.title: 2. Information We Collect
collection.content: We collect information you provide (email, name, payment details), usage data (tools used, credits consumed), and technical data (IP address, browser type, device information).

usage.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
usage.content: We use your data to provide and improve our services, process payments, send important notifications, provide customer support, and analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience.

storage.title: 4. Data Storage and Retention
storage.content: Your data is stored securely on cloud servers. We retain your data as long as your account is active or as needed to provide services. Generated content is stored until you delete it or your account is closed.

sharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal data. We may share data with service providers who help us operate (payment processors, cloud providers), and when required by law or to protect our rights.

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies for authentication, preferences, and analytics. You can control cookie settings in your browser, but some features may not work without cookies.

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal data. You can download your data or request account deletion at any time through your profile settings.

security.title: 8. Security
security.content: We implement industry-standard security measures including encryption, secure servers, and regular security audits to protect your data from unauthorized access.

changes.title: 9. Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or through our platform.

contact.title: 10. Contact Us
contact.content: For privacy-related questions or concerns, please contact our privacy team at privacy@funmagic.ai.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to common questions and get support

faq.q1: How do I get started with FunMagic AI?
faq.a1: Sign up for a free account to get started. New users receive free credits to try out our AI tools. Browse the Tools page to explore available options.
faq.a2: Credits are our universal currency for using AI tools. Each tool displays its credit cost before you use it. Credits are deducted only when a task completes successfully.
faq.q3: What happens if a task fails?
faq.a3: If a task fails due to a system error, your credits are automatically refunded. You can retry the task or try a different approach.
faq.q4: How do I download my generated content?
faq.a4: After a task completes, click 'Save to Assets' to save it to your account. Then visit the Assets page to download or manage your files.
faq.q5: Can I use the generated content commercially?
faq.a5: Yes, you own the content you create with FunMagic AI and can use it for personal or commercial purposes, subject to our Terms of Service.
faq.q6: How do I delete my account?
faq.a6: You can request account deletion from your Profile settings. This will permanently delete your account and all associated data.

contact.title: Still need help?
contact.description: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues.
